Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The percentage of the total test cases covered by the test process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Test Cases Executed / Total Test Cases) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The percentage of test cases that pass successfully.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Tests Passed / Total Tests Conducted) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete a testing cycle.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: Total Test Cycle Time / Number of Test Cycles

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The percentage of defects detected during the testing phase.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Defects Detected / Total Units Tested) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The average cost incurred for testing each unit.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: Total Testing Cost / Total Units Tested

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The rate at which testing activities are completed.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: Total Units Tested / Total Testing Time

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.EXPLANATION: The percentage of tests that need to be retested.
The percentage of test cases that are automated.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Testing.FORMULA: (Number of Automated Tests / Total Tests Conducted) * 100
